tools.name: Janus
tools.description: Janus allows streamers to control their Minecraft servers whitelist using Twitch with watchtime, followage, and subscriptions.

tools.name: AntiCreeperGrief
tools.description: This is a super simple and lightweight plugin designed to be an alternative to the Vanilla Tweaks datapack.

tools.description: This is a super simple and lightweight plugin designed to be an alternative to the Vanilla Tweaks datapack.

tools.name: AntiGhastGrief
tools.description: Ghasts can still cause damage but do not destroy blocks or start fires. This is a super simple and lightweight plugin designed to be an alternative to the Vanilla Tweaks datapack.
